item.title: The Evolution of Smoothness in Your Practice
item.description: We talk a lot about the health benefits of Tai Chi and qigong, or the way they create mental and emotional relaxation, but if you really had to distill all these benefits down to one common thread, you could say that the smoother your mind, body, and energy get, the more you are truly making progress in your practice. In this hour-long webinar, we've used the transition between two qigong courses at Brookline Tai Chi as an excuse to look at the issue of smoothness.

item.title: Straight Lines, Circles, and Spheres
item.description: One of the most fascinating connections between your mind and your body is the way that the actual physical movements that you make affect your awareness. When your movements are linear and jerky, your mind stops and starts too, essentially gapping out. If you can move in a smooth circular way, your mind tends to stay calmer too.
